definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[כְּפִירִים רָשׁוּ וְרָעֵָבוּ]] Ps 34:11 young lions are in want and hunger; elsewhere Pt. [[רָשׁ]] 1Sa 18:23 + 16 t., [[רָאשׁ]] 2Sa 12:1 + 2 t.; pl. [[רָשִׁים]] Pr 22:7, [[רָאשִׁים]] Pr 13:23;—(oft. opp. [[עָשִׁיר]]): as adj. 1Sa 18:23, 2Sa 12:1, 2Sa 12:4, Pr 28:3, Ec 4:14; as subst. = poor man (men), 2Sa 12:3, Ps 82:3, Ec 5:7, esp. Pr 10:4, Pr 13:8, Pr 13:23 + 12 t. Pr.

definitions.title: Hithpō‘leēl
definitions.body: Pt. [[מִתְרוֹשֵׁשׁ]] Pr 13:7 one impoverishing himself (opp. [[מִתְעַשֵּׁר]]; cf. Pô’l. [[רושׁשׁ]] Sir 11:12, Sir 13:5).—Je 5:17, Mal 1:4 v. [[רשׁשׁ]]. p. 439f
